name: Qing Gong
story: Xin Tuan grew up in a small village in rural China. His father was a traditional Chinese medicine practitioner, and his mother was a nurse. Xin followed in their footsteps and became a medic in the PLA. After serving for 10 years, he was recruited into the OPFOR faction as a Combat Life Saver. He is a quiet and introspective person, with a strong moral code and a deep sense of compassion for his fellow soldiers. Despite the hardships of war, he remains committed to his duty and always strives to save lives.
